Plot: Showgirls Lorelei Lee and Dorothy Shaw travel to Paris, pursued by a private detective hired by the suspicious father of Lorelei's fiancé, as well as a rich, enamored old man and many other doting admirers.
Title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
Actors: Jane Russell, Marilyn Monroe, Charles Coburn, Elliott Reid
Writer: Charles Lederer (screen play), Joseph Fields (based on the musical comedy by), Anita Loos (based on the musical comedy by)
